title: House approves emergency wage subsidy, senate expected to pass this evening - The Globe and Mail
description: House approves emergency wage subsidy, senate expected to pass this evening The Globe and Mail 'All called to serve': PM Trudeau says as COVID-19 wage subsidy bill passes House CTV News Parliament adopts wage subsidy bill as MPs applaud all-party collaboratio…
content: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau speaks in the House of Commons as legislators convene to give the government power to inject billions of dollars in emergency cash to help individuals and businesses through the economic crunch caused by the coronavirus in Ottawa… [+3755 chars]
